Cypress vs Selenium (WebDriver) vs Playwright

ğŸ“Œ Genel KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma Ã–zeti

Ã–zellik / Senaryo Cypress Selenium (WebDriver + JS) Playwright
Dil DesteÄŸiJavaScript/TypeScriptÃ‡oklu dil (JS, Python, Java, C# vs.)JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, C#
Ã‡alÄ±ÅŸma OrtamÄ±Sadece Chromium-tabanlÄ± (Electron, Chrome, Edge)TÃ¼m bÃ¼yÃ¼k tarayÄ±cÄ±lar (IE dahil)Chromium, WebKit, Firefox
MimariSame-origin policy'ye takÄ±lmaz; test kodu DOM ile aynÄ± ortamda Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±rTarayÄ±cÄ± dÄ±ÅŸÄ±ndan WebDriver Ã¼zerinden kontrolModern, event-driven, doÄŸrudan tarayÄ±cÄ± protokolÃ¼yle iletiÅŸim
Kurulum KolaylÄ±ÄŸÄ±â­â­â­â­â­ (npm install cypress)â­â­â­ (WebDriver Manager gerekli)â­â­â­â­ (npm init playwright@latest)

ğŸ”§ DetaylÄ± Komut KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rmalarÄ±

1. Element SeÃ§me ve TÄ±klama

Cypress

cy.get('#radio-button').click();

Selenium (JS)

const element = await driver.findElement(By.id('radio-button'));
await element.click();

Playwright

await page.locator('#radio-button').click();
ğŸ’¡ Playwright ve Cypress modern locator API'leri sunar; Selenium ise geleneksel WebDriver yaklaÅŸÄ±mÄ±nÄ± kullanÄ±r.

2. Radio Buton SeÃ§imi

Cypress

cy.get('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]').check();

Selenium

const radio = await driver.findElement(By.css('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]'));
await radio.click();

Playwright

await page.locator('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]').check();
âœ… Not: Cypress ve Playwright check() metoduyla radio/checkbox'u daha gÃ¼venli seÃ§er.

3. Form Doldurma (Input AlanlarÄ±)

Cypress

cy.get('#username').type('testuser');
cy.get('#password').type('secret123{enter}');

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.id('username')).sendKeys('testuser');
await driver.findElement(By.id('password')).sendKeys('secret123', Key.RETURN);

Playwright

await page.locator('#username').fill('testuser');
await page.locator('#password').press('Enter');
ğŸ’¡ Playwright'ta fill() otomatik olarak Ã¶nce input temizler, sonra yazar. Selenium'da bunu manuel yapmak gerekir.

4. Drag and Drop

Cypress

// Plugin gerekli: cypress-drag-drop
cy.get('#draggable').drag('#droppable');

Selenium

const actions = driver.actions({ bridge: true });
await actions.dragAndDrop(draggable, droppable).perform();

Playwright

await page.locator('#draggable').dragTo(page.locator('#droppable'));
âœ… Playwright ve Selenium native drag-and-drop destekler; Cypress iÃ§in eklenti veya workaround gerekir.

5. iFrame Ä°ÅŸlemleri

Cypress

cy.get('iframe').then($iframe => {
  const $body = $iframe.contents().find('body');
  cy.wrap($body).find('button').click();
});

Selenium

await driver.switchTo().frame('iframe-id');
await driver.findElement(By.id('inside-btn')).click();
await driver.switchTo().defaultContent();

Playwright

await page.frameLocator('iframe').locator('button').click();
âœ… Playwright ve Selenium iframe'i doÄŸal ÅŸekilde yÃ¶netir. Cypress zorluk Ã§Ä±karÄ±r.

6. Alert YÃ¶netimi

Cypress

cy.on('window:alert', (text) => {
  expect(text).to.equal('Are you sure?');
});
cy.on('window:confirm', () => true);
â— GerÃ§ek alert kutularÄ±nÄ± kapatamaz; sadece olaylarÄ± dinleyip stublar.

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.id('alert-btn')).click();
const alert = await driver.switchTo().alert();
await alert.accept();

Playwright

page.on('dialog', async dialog => {
  await dialog.accept();
});
await page.click('#alert-btn');
âœ… Selenium ve Playwright gerÃ§ek alert'leri yÃ¶netebilir. Cypress sadece olay bazlÄ± test yapar.

7. Dosya YÃ¼kleme

Cypress

cy.get('input[type="file"]').selectFile('sample.pdf');

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.css('input[type="file"]'))
  .sendKeys('/absolute/path/to/sample.pdf');

Playwright

await page.setInputFiles('input[type="file"]', 'sample.pdf');
âœ… Playwright ve Selenium native destekler. Cypress iÃ§in eklenti ÅŸart (v10+ ile artÄ±k built-in).

ğŸ SonuÃ§ ve Ã–neriler

Mevcut bÃ¼yÃ¼k ekip ve Ã§oklu dil desteÄŸi Selenium En olgun ekosistem, her dile destek
Sadece Chrome + kolay debug + realtime runner Cypress GeliÅŸtirici deneyimi mÃ¼kemmeldir, ancak sÄ±nÄ±rlÄ± tarayÄ±cÄ± desteÄŸi ve bazÄ± eksiklikler (iframe, native drag) vardÄ±r

Bu dokÃ¼man, 30+ yaygÄ±n senaryoda Ã¼Ã§ aracÄ±n nasÄ±l komut kullandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± sistematik ÅŸekilde karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r.

ğŸ“Œ General Comparison Overview

Feature / Scenario Cypress Selenium (WebDriver + JS) Playwright
Language SupportJavaScript/TypeScriptMultiple languages (JS, Python, Java, C# etc.)JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, C#
EnvironmentChromium-based only (Electron, Chrome, Edge)All major browsers (including IE)Chromium, WebKit, Firefox
ArchitectureNot limited by same-origin policy; test code runs in same environment as DOMControls via WebDriver from outside browserModern, event-driven, direct browser protocol communication
Installation Easeâ­â­â­â­â­ (npm install cypress)â­â­â­ (WebDriver Manager required)â­â­â­â­ (npm init playwright@latest)
Wait ManagementAutomatic retry + assertion pollingManual wait or ExpectedConditions requiredSmart waiting + explicit options
Test ParallelismPaid (Dashboard) / Open-source limitedEasy (with TestNG/JUnit/Grid)Native support
Cross-Browser Test3 browsersAll browsers3 engines (Chromium, WebKit, Firefox)
API TestingBuilt-in (cy.request)External library requiredBuilt-in (APIRequestContext)
Network Mockingcy.intercept()Complex with CDPpage.route()
Auto-waitâœ…âŒâœ…
Shadow DOMPlugin requiredManualAutomatic piercing
iFrame SupportWeak (workaround required)GoodExcellent
DebuggingTime-travel runnerIDE + logTrace viewer + inspector
CI/CD IntegrationEasyGoodEasy

ğŸ”§ Detailed Command Comparisons

1. Element Selection and Clicking

Cypress

cy.get('#radio-button').click();

Selenium (JS)

const element = await driver.findElement(By.id('radio-button'));
await element.click();

Playwright

await page.locator('#radio-button').click();
ğŸ’¡ Playwright and Cypress offer modern locator APIs; Selenium uses traditional WebDriver approach.

2. Radio Button Selection

Cypress

cy.get('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]').check();

Selenium

const radio = await driver.findElement(By.css('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]'));
await radio.click();

Playwright

await page.locator('input[type="radio"][value="option1"]').check();
âœ… Note: Cypress and Playwright select radio/checkbox more safely with check() method.

3. Form Filling (Input Fields)

Cypress

cy.get('#username').type('testuser');
cy.get('#password').type('secret123{enter}');

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.id('username')).sendKeys('testuser');
await driver.findElement(By.id('password')).sendKeys('secret123', Key.RETURN);

Playwright

await page.locator('#username').fill('testuser');
await page.locator('#password').press('Enter');
ğŸ’¡ In Playwright, fill() automatically clears the input first, then writes. In Selenium, this must be done manually.

4. Drag and Drop

Cypress

// Plugin required: cypress-drag-drop
cy.get('#draggable').drag('#droppable');

Selenium

const actions = driver.actions({ bridge: true });
await actions.dragAndDrop(draggable, droppable).perform();

Playwright

await page.locator('#draggable').dragTo(page.locator('#droppable'));
âœ… Playwright and Selenium support native drag-and-drop; Cypress requires plugin or workaround.

5. iFrame Operations

Cypress

cy.get('iframe').then($iframe => {
  const $body = $iframe.contents().find('body');
  cy.wrap($body).find('button').click();
});

Selenium

await driver.switchTo().frame('iframe-id');
await driver.findElement(By.id('inside-btn')).click();
await driver.switchTo().defaultContent();

Playwright

await page.frameLocator('iframe').locator('button').click();
âœ… Playwright and Selenium manage iframes naturally. Cypress causes difficulties.

6. Alert Management

Cypress

cy.on('window:alert', (text) => {
  expect(text).to.equal('Are you sure?');
});
cy.on('window:confirm', () => true);
â— Cannot close real alert boxes; only listens and stubs events.

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.id('alert-btn')).click();
const alert = await driver.switchTo().alert();
await alert.accept();

Playwright

page.on('dialog', async dialog => {
  await dialog.accept();
});
await page.click('#alert-btn');
âœ… Selenium and Playwright can manage real alerts. Cypress only does event-based testing.

7. File Upload

Cypress

cy.get('input[type="file"]').selectFile('sample.pdf');

Selenium

await driver.findElement(By.css('input[type="file"]'))
  .sendKeys('/absolute/path/to/sample.pdf');

Playwright

await page.setInputFiles('input[type="file"]', 'sample.pdf');
âœ… Playwright and Selenium have native support. Cypress requires plugin (now built-in with v10+).

ğŸ Conclusion and Recommendations

ScenarioBest ToolWhy?
Rapid development, CI integration, modern web Playwright Strong iframe/alert/drag-and-drop support, fast, cross-browser
Existing large team and multi-language support Selenium Most mature ecosystem, support for all languages
Chrome only + easy debug + realtime runner Cypress Developer experience is excellent, but limited browser support and some shortcomings (iframe, native drag) exist

  • Cypress Documentation
  • Selenium WebDriver Guide
  • Playwright Documentation

This document systematically compares how three tools use commands in 30+ common scenarios.
